data.title: Uttarakhand rains: 52 people dead, 5 still missing
data.description: Most of the deaths were due to house collapses - an official statement said 46 of them suffered damage. Twenty-eight of the deaths were in Nainital district alone.

data.title: Sensex, Nifty likely to open higher amid positive global cues
data.description: Equity market slipped for the second straight session on Wednesday as investors booked profits at higher levels. Sensex closed 456.09 points or 0.74 per cent lower at 61,259.96 and Nifty fell 152.15 points or 0.83 per cent to 18,266.60.

data.title: Stock Market Updates: Sensex gains 250 points, Nifty above 18,350; IRCTC zooms 6%
data.description: At 09:18 hours, the 30-share BSE index was trading 265.67 points or 0.43 per cent higher at 61,525.63, and the broader NSE Nifty was up 92 points or 0.50 per cent to 18,358.25.

data.description: Indian national team head coach Igor Stimac, also in charge of the U23 squad for the upcoming U23 AFC Asian Cup Qualifiers, feels that they need to find the right balance in the team. The Indian colts are pitted alongside Oman, UAE, and Kyrgyz Republic in Group E of the qualifiers.

data.description: The company's BaaS platform stands in contract with built-from-scratch manual solutions, entails zero-coding, facilitates the generation of iterative dApps, provides multi-cloud and multi-chain support.

data.title: Profit booking, valuation woes lead to selloff in smallcap, midcap stocks

data.title: 2021 Hockey India Junior Women National Championship | Karnataka, Punjab and Tamil Nadu register big wins on opening day
data.description: The respective hockey teams from Karnataka, Punjab, and Tamil Nadu registered convincing wins on their opening fixtures on Day 1 of the ongoing Hockey India Junior Women National Championship. 28 teams from across the country are participating in the meet, with the final to be played on October 30.

data.title: Aryan Khan drug case: NCB teams reach Shah Rukh Khan's home; Ananya Pandey's house searched too
data.description: A team of Narcotics Control Bureau (NCB) officials reached Shah Rukh Khan's residence 'Manat' in Bandra on Thursday in connection with the Mumbai cruise drugs case in which his son Aryan Khan has been arrested.

data.title: Want to buy iPhone 13 Pro in India? You may have to wait for long as supply runs low
data.description: The recently launched iPhone 13 phones, particularly the iPhone 13 Pro and the iPhone 13 Pro Max, are running low on supply. Even in cases where the phones are available, most of the time, users aren't getting their choice of colour or variant.
